snippet: A 14-year-old boy opened fire, hitting two students, then ran from the school and was apprehended nearby with the help of a police dog.
abstract: Shooting by 14-year-old boy at Madison Local Schools near Middleton, Ohio, injures two students before shooter is captured by authorities; teen faces two counts of attempted murder, among other preliminary charges.
lead_paragraph: A 14-year-old boy opened fire, hitting two students, then ran from the school and was apprehended nearby with the help of a police dog.

headline.main: Ohio: Two Students Shot in School Cafeteria
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Two Students Shot in School Cafeteria
